'0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' THEN '0' END IsLeadingOfficial FROM B_SalesGroupMember a INNER JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser b ON b.ID=a.MemberID AND b.IsDel=0 AND b.Status=1 left join B_SalesGroup c on c.ID=a.ReceptionGroupID INNER JOIN dbo.S_Dictionary d ON d.ID=a.RoleID AND d.IsDel=0 AND d.PID='54E311BD-943C-41E6-BF09-42191198C229' INNER JOIN dbo.S_Account e ON e.ID=a.MemberID AND e.IsDel=0 AND e.Status=1 left JOIN S_Organization o ON e.UserOrgID = o.ID AND o.IsDel = 0 WHERE a.IsDel=0 and a.RoleID!='E417A997-9A91-4D22-8428-9C2C2C560656' AND a.ProjectID<>'' AND a.ProjectID=#{ProjectID} AND ISNULL(c.IsDel,0)<>1 ORDER BY d.ListIndex

SELECT DISTINCT a.[ID] UserID,a.[UserName],a.[EmployeeName] Name,b.FullPath OrgName FROM S_Account a --left JOIN dbo.S_JobsUserRel jur ON a.IsDel = 0 AND a.ID = jur.AccountID --left JOIN dbo.S_Jobs j ON jur.JobID = j.ID AND j.IsDel = 0 --left JOIN S_Organization o ON j.JobOrgID = o.ID AND o.IsDel = 0 LEFT JOIN dbo.S_Organization b ON b.ID=a.UserOrgID AND b.IsDel=0 where a.isdel=0 and a.status=1 and a.id not in ( select memberid from B_SalesGroupMember where isdel=0 and status=1 and ProjectID= #{paramMap.ProjectID} ${paramMap.whereOne}) ${paramMap.where}

SELECT DISTINCT a.ID UserID,b.UserName,b.EmployeeName Name,o.FullPath OrgName, CASE a.RoleID WHEN 'A2C076C4-09D1-4B42-862D-8688A93320F4' THEN '0' WHEN '9584A4B7-F105-44BA-928D-F2FBA2F3B4A4' THEN '0' WHEN '3BC23001-BC31-4594-8463-C7DA89C0FB36' THEN '1' WHEN '8100EAF4-FBCE-408B-A51D-B7247A3ADB19' THEN '0' WHEN '97F5E202-2D3B-4935-BA91-4AFD5C5578FC' THEN '0' WHEN 'B0BF5636-94AD-4814-BB67-9C1873566F29' THEN '1' WHEN '48FC928F-6EB5-4735-BF2B-29B1F591A582' THEN '0' WHEN '938935B7-4131-4E61-A811-4323A7F193A2' THEN '0' WHEN '0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7' THEN '0' END IsLeadingOfficial FROM B_SalesGroupMember a INNER JOIN S_Account b ON b.ID=a.MemberID AND b.IsDel=0 and b.Status=1 left join B_SalesGroup c on c.ID=a.ReceptionGroupID INNER JOIN dbo.S_Dictionary d ON d.ID=a.RoleID AND d.IsDel=0 AND d.PID='54E311BD-943C-41E6-BF09-42191198C229' left JOIN S_Organization o ON b.UserOrgID = o.ID AND o.IsDel = 0 INNER JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser z ON z.ID=a.MemberID AND z.IsDel=0 AND z.Status=1 WHERE a.IsDel=0 AND ISNULL(c.IsDel,0)<>1 ${paramMap.where} and a.RoleID!='E417A997-9A91-4D22-8428-9C2C2C560656'

SELECT TOP 1 su.Name UserName, p.Name ProjectName FROM dbo.B_SalesGroupMember sgm INNER JOIN dbo.B_SalesUser su ON su.ID = sgm.MemberID INNER JOIN dbo.B_Project p ON p.ID = sgm.ProjectID WHERE sgm.IsDel = 0 AND sgm.Status = 1 AND (sgm.MemberID = #{MemberID} OR sgm.ID = #{MemberID}) AND sgm.RoleID = #{RoleID} AND ProjectID != #{ProjectID} ORDER BY sgm.CreateTime DESC

SELECT A.ReceptionGroupID,P.Name as pName,G.Name as gName FROM B_SalesGroupMember A LEFT JOIN B_SalesGroup G ON A.ReceptionGroupID = G.ID LEFT JOIN B_Project P ON A.ProjectID = P.ID WHERE A.ProjectID = #{ProjectID} AND A.MemberID = #{SaleUserID} AND A.Status = 1 AND A.IsDel = 0 AND A.RoleID = '0269F35E-B32D-4D12-8496-4E6E4CE597B7'
